issues.title: Dividend increase measurement not specified
issues.description: 'increased dividends' - unclear if absolute or percentage increase, and measurement basis
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Increased annual dividend per share by any positive amount year-over-year for 25 consecutive fiscal years'

issues.title: Size adjustment methodology not specified
issues.description: 'adjustments for company size' without defining the adjustment formula
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Weight = (Dividend_Yield × Market_Cap^0.5) / Sum of all (Dividend_Yield × Market_Cap^0.5)' or other explicit formula

issues.title: Maximum weight cap not specified
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Maximum 5% weight per constituent at reconstitution'

issues.title: Annual reconstitution date not specified
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Annual reconstitution effective after close on third Friday in December'

issues.title: Dividend cut vs freeze distinction unclear
issues.description: 'cut or suspend' - unclear if maintaining flat dividend (not increasing) triggers removal
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify: 'Removal triggered by dividend reduction or suspension. Flat dividend (no increase) does not trigger removal, but company cannot qualify for future addition until 25-year streak resumes'
